com.deezer.sdk.network.request.event

Class JsonRequestListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deezer.sdk.network.request.event.JsonRequestListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RequestListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RadioCategoriesRequestListener

    public abstract class JsonRequestListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestListener
    Callback implementation for API requests.

    This class will try and parse the JSON response from Deezer webservices to ease the use of the API. The result objects will be instances of classes in the com.deezer.sdk.model package.

    Author:
    Deezer
    See Also:
    DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask

        public abstract void onResult(java.lang.Object result,
            java.lang.Object requestId)
        Called when the request response has been parsed into a valid object
        Parameters:
        result - the result object parsed from the json response
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.

        Called when the request response could not be parsed into a valid object

      • onComplete

        public void onComplete(java.lang.String response,
              java.lang.Object requestId)
        Description copied from interface: RequestListener
        Called when a request completes with the given response. If the Listener is used by DeezerConnectInterface.requestAsync, this method is executed by a background thread: do not update the UI in this method. If you use an AsyncDeezerTask, in that case it will run on UI thread.
        Specified by:
        onComplete in interface RequestListener
        Parameters:
        response - the json response.
        requestId - the value passed when originally calling the request method, or null if none was passed.
        See Also:
        DeezerConnect.requestAsync(DeezerRequest, RequestListener), AsyncDeezerTask
